Herald Lance

one handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 39
spell [itemspell]: #514 Solar Rays
inspirational leadership [inspirational]: +1
weap id [weapon]: 109 (Herald Lance)
damage [dmg]: 6 Damage (x3 vs Undead/Demon)
attack [att]: +1
defence [def]: +1
length [len]: 3
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Piercing Damage [pierce], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

This spear is enchanted with essence from the Sun. When used against undead beings, it will strike with enormous force. It can fire Solar Rays that burn undead beings from a distance. The brilliance of this spear will inspire all friendly units under the spear wielders command.
